4 Sound "door.opus"
5 Text d "The sound of the door means a new customer has entered your store. Get ready!"
6 Speech player "At this rate, maybe I'll be able to afford to keep this roof over my head."
7 Speech subeelb "What kind of warp drives do you have here? I want to make sure it is compatible with my drive port."
8 Text d "Well, that was confusing. It seems like they have a question. Let's store this as a special request to look at later."
